text: Pierre-Paul-Henri-Gaston Doumergue (; 1 August 1863 18 June 1937) was a French politician. He was the President of France from 1924 to 1931. ==References== Category:1863 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Presidents of France Category:People from Gard Category:Politicians from Occitanie Category:20th-century presidents of France
title: Gaston Doumergue
